entry.def: A bullfinch is a type of small European bird. The male has a black head and a pinkish-red breast.

means.word_mean: 1. common European finch mostly black and white with red throat and breast

auth_sentence.content: Bullfinch Bullfinches are plump, colourful birds, males sport a bright rosy-red breast and cheeks, white rump and a stubby bill.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bullfinch Bullfinches are plump, colourful birds, males sport a bright rosy-red breast and cheeks, white rump and a stubby bill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bullfinch Bullfinches are plump, colourful birds, males sport a bright rosy-red breast and cheeks, white rump and a stubby bill.

auth_sentence.content: It's a good species, as separate from our own bullfinch as a blackbird is from a song thrush.
